55#ifndef AM_MCU_APOLLO_H
56#define AM_MCU_APOLLO_H
57
58//*****************************************************************************
59//
60// Arm architecture intrinsics and options
61// Security extensions
62// Vector extension
63//
64//*****************************************************************************
65#include <arm_cmse.h> // Include ARM Security Extensions
66
67#if (__ARM_FEATURE_MVE & 3) == 3 // MVE integer and floating point intrinsics available
68#include <arm_mve.h> // Include M-Profile Vector Extension aka Helium
69#elif (__ARM_FEATURE_MVE & 1) == 1 // MVE integer intrinsics available
70#include <arm_mve.h> // Include M-Profile Vector Extension aka Helium
71#else
72// Compiler options for vector extensions are not enabled.
73#ifndef AM_HAL_SKIP_NO_MVE_WARNING
74#warning MVE intrinsics not available
75#endif
76#endif
77

This file controls peripheral access in Apollo5.

Functions for operating the instrumentation trace macrocell.

Functions for interfacing with the MCUCTRL.

Functions for enabling and disabling power domains.

Functions for implementing a queue system.

Hardware abstraction layer for the Reset Generator module.

Functions for interfacing with the Real-Time Clock (RTC).

Functions for interfacing with the SDHC.

Functions for secure over-the-air.

SPOT manager functions that manage power states.

Global status return codes for HAL interface.

Functions for interfacing with the system timer (STIMER).

Functions for interfacing with the System PLL.

Functions for interfacing with the SYSTICK.

Functions for interfacing with the timer (TIMER).

Support functions for the Arm TPIU module.

Hardware abstraction for the UART.

UART streaming mode Hardware abstraction.

Functions for USB module.

API for the USB Charger Detection module.

HAL Utility Functions.

Functions for operating the on-chip Voltage Comparator.
